overview: Ravi is currently VP of Engineering and Product Management at Betfair and is a Board Member at Kabam.com. He brings 20 years of business and technology experience leading software and infrastructure development, from start-ups to established companies. Prior to Betfair, he was most recently the Vice President of Engineering at Coupons, Inc.; the No. 1 ranked company in the coupons/rewards category. With Ravi driving technology, Coupons.com achieved a Top 50 U.S. web property ranking. Prior to that, Ravi was VP of Engineering at PocketThis, an award-winning wireless data services platform with businesses in Europe and the U.S. Ravi also served as the Vice President of Engineering at iSyndicate, a market-leading content syndication services company. Holding a Master’s degree in engineering from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute with graduate research work in pattern-based design software, Ravi is also named on a granted and various pending patents in web based offer distribution systems and DRM systems for mass consumer products.
